job.title: Lead/Principal Software Engineer, Tableau Prototyping team
job.description: Products and Technology Tableau’s Prototype Engineering team designs and develops prototypes of early ideas that could lead to new features, functionality, or even products with a goal of quickly proving out ideas before we take them to production. We’re looking for generalists who love to tackle complex issues and excel working on ambiguous problems! Join us to leverage your creativity and experience to imagine and create new capabilities or products that change how our customers analyze, manage, model, and engage with their data. If you require assistance due to a disability applying for open positions please submit a request via this Accommodations Request Form. At Salesforce we believe that the business of business is to improve the state of our world. Each of us has a responsibility to drive Equality in our communities and workplaces. We are committed to creating a workforce that reflects society through inclusive programs and initiatives such as equal pay, employee resource groups, inclusive benefits, and more. Learn more about Equality at Salesforce and explore our benefits. and are Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employers. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender perception or identity, national origin, age, marital status, protected veteran status, or disability status. and do not accept unsolicited headhunter and agency resumes. and will not pay any third-party agency or company that does not have a signed agreement with or .  Salesforce welcomes all.
